name: Phase of the Scarab
description:
Archaeologist (you) found a weird tomb full of scarabs that can be destroyed only with items that are in the same phase as they are. Use tombs ancient technology of phasing to destroy all the scarabs.

By standing in different phase circles, your hammer gets phased and will hurt scarab of same phase (red, blue, ...)

Controls: WASD or arrows for movement, left mouse click for throw attack
